```{js}
// addEventListener support for IE8
function bindEvent(element, eventName, eventHandler) {
    if (element.addEventListener) {
        element.addEventListener(eventName, eventHandler, false);
    } else if (element.attachEvent) {
        element.attachEvent('on' + eventName, eventHandler);
    }
}

// Send Message
var sendMessage = function (msg) {
  // Make sure you are sending a string, and to stringify JSON
  window.parent.postMessage(msg, '*');
};

// Send a message to the Parent on hashchange event
// bindEvent(window, 'hashchange', function () {
//   var hash = JSON.stringify(window.location.hash)
//   var hashstr = hash.replace("_", "-");
//   sendMessage('locHash:' + hashstr);
// });

document.getElementById("TOC").addEventListener('hashchange', function () { console.log('hash changed!') })

// Listen to message from Parent
bindEvent(window, 'message', function (e) {
  var hashobj = e.data;
  var hashstr = hashobj.replace("_", "-");
  window.location.hash = hashstr;
});
```
